messages.message: @Rafal Will that capability be available in Build apps, as well?

We didn’t yet plan a roadmap for it
Firstly, we want to give it internally to test. Then depending on the feedback we will be planning how quickly we would want to have it in the product :slightly_smiling_face:
Also for build mode we have other options. I think using LLM to get the raw numbers and then refiner rules (possible autogenerated) to do math is more reliable way to do this.
